Name: Extreme Painting Puzzles
About the game: Extreme Painting Puzzles is a puzzle-type puzzle game. In the game you must solve different puzzles with different difficulties. The theme of the game is the 10 most famous paintings in the history of the world. Try to solve a puzzle in the shortest time possible and overcome your best time. By winning you can access another puzzle and unlock steam achievements.
